alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued April 19 at 10:28AM CDT until April 19 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM MDT/1100 AM CDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN WALLACE...THOMAS...NORTHERN LOGAN...SOUTHEASTERN SHERMAN AND NORTHWESTERN GOVE COUNTIES... At 926 AM MDT/1026 AM CDT/, several areas of blowing dust where observed across the advisory area. HAZARD...Less than a mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. Emergency management has reported visibility as low as a half of a mile in some spots. Rapid changes in visibility expected. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 29 and 83. Locations impacted include... Colby, Oakley, Brewster, Levant, Rexford, Winona and Monument. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
